div.p: For me the next stage would be about, because we always have to refer back to solicitors should a situation become quite tricky
i.e. a tenant doesn’t want to leave a property or there’s a major dispute between the landlord and tenant in terms of what their contractual obligations
to one another are so they would then have to contact a solicitor who would be able to represent their side should the matter go to court.
So there is an opportunity through, I think it’s Sylex, that you can obtain a level of qualification within the Law Society
that you are able to represent your clients in court without having to go through the long process of becoming a solicitor so this is a
shortened version of becoming a solicitor
